data:item.name: flexio_camera_rt1010
data:item.display_title: AN12686: Emulation of parallel camera interface via FlexIO on i.MX RT1010
data:item.overview: This software accompanies application note [AN12686](https://www.nxp.com/docs/en/application-note/AN12686.pdf), which describes how toÂ use the FlexIO to emulate the parallel camera interface to receive real-time image data from a camera device based on i.MX RT1010.
